mdRecord.dcterms:title: Wings Over Europe
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster for the plays Wings Over Europe, July 2-3, Revival of the Broadway play of 1927 that foretold the atomic bomb | 3 Men on a Horse, July 4-5 | Stage Door, July 6.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The original object is the property of the Barter Theatre in Abingdon, VA (https://www.bartertheatre.com/). This digital surrogate is made publicly available by the Barter Theatre for use in research, teaching, private study, and other educational purposes.
